column1: Art Institute of Chicago////$18 well worth it.  This is probably the second best art museum I've been to (I've been to a fair share) behind the Louvre
column2: but this is still awesome nonetheless.  There is art for everyone (even for you ultra modern contemporary types yuck (action painting?  blank canvases?  multi block colored canvases???).  I loved the new modern wing (Dali
column4: Chagall)...it was ridiculously nice.  It's huge - I could spend a few days in here.  If I lived in Chicago
column5: I'd def be a member here.
